SourceProxy.name: NASA CDAweb Space Craft Data Source

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRangeInfoStart
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Information on Start Time to Property panel

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRangeInfoEnd
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Information on End Time to Property panel

DoubleVectorProperty.name: TimeRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property passes time values back to the source

IntVectorProperty.name: TimeFitHandler
IntVectorProperty.label: Time Fit Handler

Entry.text: Fit to next lower available time
Fit to next higher available time

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how you would like to fit CDAweb data to your model data. 1) "Fit to Next Lower" will provide data from the closest time less than model time 2) "Fit to Next Upper" will proivde data from the closest time greater than model time 3) "Interpolate Linearly" between the two closest valid data points

IntVectorProperty.name: BadDataHandler
IntVectorProperty.label: Bad Data Handler
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select how you would like to handle bad data within the CDF files. 1) "OMIT" will just not provide the value to the filter 2) "Linear Interpolation" will interpolate over time 3) "Raw Data" will provide data AS-IS from the CDF file

StringVectorProperty.name: SpaceCraftInfoProperties
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the Desired space craft and data sets from NASAs CDAweb.
